title: Code Editor
description: GUI code editor applications for Linux and Windows with C and C++
content: C & (X11) for Linux, C++ & (Win32 API) for Windows
Double buffering, handling windows, importing and rendering fonts, event systems

title: JsPDF Target Generator

content: A simple chain algorithm, displayed in a cute printable format
